itunes:title: #66: Changing and Learning New Lessons
title: #66: Changing and Learning New Lessons
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: In our life, we are GOING to change, and we have to adjust with those transitions along with learn the lessons that stage is trying to teach us.  We dig into this concept more along with practicing humility and owning your power.   ...
itunes:summary:
In our life, we are GOING to change, and we have to adjust with those transitions along with learn the lessons that stage is trying to teach us. 

We dig into this concept more along with practicing humility and owning your power.
